definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :2Ki 18:24 governor (loan-word fr. As. paḫâti [abbrev. from bel paḫâti], lord of a district; cf. perh. OAram. [[פחי]] governor);—abs. ´[[הַפּ]] Ne 5:14, cstr. [[פַּחַ֫ת]] Hag 1:1 +, [[פֵּחַת־]] Hag 2:21; sf. [[פֶּחָחְֶָ]] Mal 1:8, [[פֶּחָם]] Ne 5:14 (but read prob. [[פֶּחָה]]); pl. abs. [[פַּחוֹת]] 1Ki 20:24 +; cstr. [[פַּחוֹת]] 1Ki 10:15 = 2Ch 9:14, [[פַּחֲווֹת]] Ezr 8:36 +; sf. [[פַּחוֹתֶיהָ]] Je 51:28, Je 51:57; —as Assyr. captains 2Ki 18:24 = Is 36:9 (< del. ´[[פ]], cf. Sta:ZAW vi (1886), 182 al.), cf. Ez Eze 23:6, Eze 23:12; of Babylon Je 51:23, Je 51:57, and Bab. allies Ez Eze 23:23; of Media Je 51:28; Pers. governor of [[עֵבֶר הַנׇּהָר]], i. e. in Pal., Hag 1:1, Hag 1:14, Hag 2:2, Hag 2:21, Ne 2:7, Ne 2:9 + 8 t.; Pers. satraps in gen. Es 3:12, Es 8:9, Es 9:3; applied (by late writer) to Sol.'s governors 1Ki 10:15 = 2Ch 9:14; Benhadad's captains 1Ki 20:24 (del. v., Sta al.).—Cf. BAram.
